ygData.subject: Re: Making Plat
ygData.msgSnippet: I felt like writing back about being pathetic...I don t think it s my fault that the economy, or lack there of, of EQ is messed up.  if you wanted to you could
ygData.messageBody:
I felt like writing back about being pathetic...I don't think it's my fault
that the economy, or lack there of, of EQ is messed up. if you wanted to
you could take a completly untwinked lvl 1 character, run mail quests for a
while to get money, then buy anything you wanted to buy. so in theroy you
could have a very low lvl character (you'd gain XP from questing to I'm not
going to say lvl 1) with a Oracle robe, staff of writhing, stien of moggok,
glowing black stone, et cetera that earned every last CP of it on his own.

just my 2 coppers,
Omegio

PS..at least I'm interacting with other characters by merchanting :)


> pretty pathetic, i was wearing my sr apprentice robe until level 27 when
>i
> actually went in najena myself and got it by killing her.
>
> Veldra Rae`lynn
> lvl 43 magician
> Veeshan
